evidence.claim: Laborie utilizes AWS services for cloud infrastructure and hosting capabilities.
The company implements FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
Laborie supports EHR integrations for seamless data exchange in compliance with HIPAA.
X12 EDI standards are used for transactions such as eligibility and claims processing.
Laborie has middleware solutions for data streaming and integration with existing healthcare systems.

icp.icp_reason: Laborie operates in healthcare, utilizing X12 standards and APIs, aligning with ICP criteria.
